summary: RE:  TOMBERLIN LSV (LOW SPEED VEHICLE), MODEL E2LE, 2010 MODEL.    PROBLEM:  THE SEAT BELT (WHICH IS REQUIRED EQUIPMENT FOR STREET USE) IS NOT USABLE BECAUSE IT IS TOO SHORT.  DEALER IS UNRESPONSIVE CONCERNING ANY CORRECTION.    NOTE:  I HAD TO SPECIFY AN AUTO MFGR. AND MODEL TO COMPLETE THIS COMPLAINT.  THERE IS NOT OTHER WAY TO COMPLETE THE COMPLAINT.  THEREFORE THE AUTO MFGR. AND MODEL GIVEN LATER IN THIS COMPLAINT IS NOT CORRECT.  THE CORRECT MFGR. IS TOMBERLIN WHO MAKES STREET LEGAL GOLF CARTS AND IS NOT SHOWN IN YOUR LIST. *TR  UPDATE: FEB 4, 2011 BOWMAN AT NHTSA CORRECTED.
